p: Fomitopsis pinicola, like many other fungi, are predominantly identified phenotypically, but require molecular biology techniques to confirm the identification. Internal spacer region (ITS)2 sequencing is a suitable method that is routinely used for the correct identification of numerous species, including F. pinicola. Unfortunately, it can appear phenotypically similar to Ganoderma lingzhi and other species of the genus Fomitopsis, and therefore it is important to confirm the speciation of the specimen one is working with prior to publication.
